description:
<p>An opportunity has arisen for a Pharmacist to join our team. You will be supported by the Pharmacy Manager and help to provide a high quality, patient focused service, to a range of departments within the hospital.<br /><br />As a Pharmacist you will have defined responsibilities including dispensing, supporting the delivery of the pharmacy service through effective co-ordination of day to day activities, procurement, distribution, stock taking and evaluation and assisting in top ups.<br /><br /><strong>About the Role</strong><br />The Pharmacy team provide a clinical service to Surgical and Medical inpatients, Surgical day case patients, the Outpatient department. The role includes clinical screening, supplying discharge medication, patient counselling, medicines reconciliation, and medicines information.</p>
<p>You will be registered with the General Pharmaceutical Council and ideally will have recent hospital experience. A Post Graduate Clinical Diploma or previous oncology experience would be beneficial but not essential.</p>
